rev.comment: /* DRM in Google Video */ specifics not yet released
rev.diff:
Line 277: Line 277:
===DRM in Google Video===
===DRM in Google Video===
â
Announced on January 6 at the CES in Las Vegas, the Google Video Store is supposed to sell video content at the Google Video website. For that Google created a Google DRM (Digital Rights Management) lock for certain paid content. This has been criticized on [http://mutednoise.com/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=1879 some blogs].
+
Announced on January 6 at the CES in Las Vegas, the Google Video Store is supposed to sell video content at the Google Video website. For that Google created a Google DRM (Digital Rights Management) lock for certain paid content. This has been criticized on [http://mutednoise.com/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=1879 some blogs], although the specifics of Google's DRM have not yet been released.
